code: export var changeLimit=function changeLimit(){return{type:'INCREASE_LIMIT'};};export var resetLimit=function resetLimit(){return{type:'RESET_LIMIT'};};export var setName=function setName(name){return{type:'SET_NAME',name:name};};export var setSort=function setSort(prop,toggle,val){return{type:'SET_SORT',prop:prop,toggle:toggle,val:val};};export var toggleOptions=function toggleOptions(){return{type:'TOGGLE_OPTIONS'};};
